output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to our criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF: 11240060" which indicates this is electoral content 2. Refers to candidate: Not directly, but refers to "vechii politicieni" (old politicians) 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, it's a paid advertisement with 90,000-99,999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, it clearly has an electoral message with "Schimbă-i!" (Change them!) 5. Journalism: No, this is not journalistic content but rather a political message 6. Personal opinion: While it expresses an opinion, it's structured as a campaign message with CMF
The post criticizes current political leadership using the contrast between healthcare needs and public money spent on entertainment (manele). The message "Schimbă-i!" is a clear call to action for electoral purposes. The presence of a CMF number confirms this is campaign material.
The timing of the post (November 20, 2024) and its continuation into the presidential election period makes it problematic under Article 55 t).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This qualifies as electoral propaganda because: - Has official CMF number - Makes a clear electoral call to action ("Schimbă-i!") - Is paid advertising reaching a large audience - Criticizes current political leadership - Contains a political message about resource allocation
conclusion.message-for-police: Ghergu Nicolae-Marius, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin continuarea propagandei electorale după încheierea campaniei, manifestată prin postarea cu ID 1266932291022514 pe facebook. Postarea, efectuată după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, conține elementele specifice materialelor de propagandă electorală (CMF 11240060), un mesaj electoral explicit ("Schimbă-i!"), și critici la adresa conducerii actuale, fiind promovată prin publicitate plătită cu un impact estimat între 90.000 și 99.999 de afișări. Materialul are scop electoral evident și vizează influențarea votului în cadrul alegerilor prezidențiale.
